long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily add items to your parking lot in Helix platform from the comfort of your own browser.
Using this extension you can add URLs directly to your parking lot without having to deal with copying and pasting any URLs.

The extension will also automatically extract information for fields such as title (this works on most websites, however some are not entirely compatible).

Helix is a tool for used for internal displacement monitoring for IDMC.


Read about our privacy policy here: https://helix-extension-policy.idmcdb.org/

Any questions? Contact idmc.labs@gmail.com
